amendment.description: To establish a bipartisan commission for the purpose of improving oversight and eliminating wasteful government spending under the President's Emergency Plan for AIDS Relief.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5083 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 32 - 63. Record Vote Number: 178.

action.text: Amendment SA 5083 proposed by Senator Cornyn. (consideration: CR S6813-6815, S6816) To establish a bipartisan commission for the purpose of improving oversight and eliminating wasteful government spending under the President's Emergency Plan for AIDS Relief.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5083 proposed by Senator Cornyn.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 5083 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 32 - 63. Record Vote Number: 178.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 5083 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 32 - 63. Record Vote Number: 178.
